{{letter_head or ''}}

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.offer_date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }}


Offer Letter


TO,
{{doc.applicant_name or ""}}
{% set address = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "current_address") %} {{address or ""}}



Dear {{doc.applicant_name or ""}}



We are pleased to offer you the position of "{{doc.designation or ""}}" at Swati Airport Support Services Pvt Ltd, Hyderabad. Your annual compensation will be {% set ctc = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "ctc") %} Rs {{ctc or ""}}(CTC per annum), which includes fixed and variable components detailed in Annexure I in Appointment letter. Allowances, benefits, and employment terms will align with company policies, which may be updated periodically.


We request you to join us on or before {% set date = frappe.db.get_value("Employee",{"job_applicant": doc.job_applicant}, "date_of_joining") %} {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(date, "dd MMMM yyyy") }} and bring the following documents to the HR Department upon joining:


1. Five passport-size photographs
2. Photocopies of all educational certificates
3. ID proof
4. Residential proof (Aadhar card)
5. Experience certificates
6. Relieving letter from your previous company
7. Biodata/CV


Your appointment will begin with a six-month probation period, after which your employment will be automatically confirmed. Kindly acknowledge this offer by email and confirm your exact joining date. Please sign the acceptance section below and return it to us as confirmation.


We look forward to having you join our team!





Authorized Signatory.
Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd

Acceptance:

I Swati, accept the above terms and conditions of my appointment as CEO of Swati Airport Support Services Pvt. Ltd.


Name Date Signature
